name: Tequilla Gravley
text: My children, husband and I often order pizza from this pizza hut location.  We have never been displeased with our orders.  We have ordered a variety of things from this restaurant.  This restaurant has speedy delivery & friendly employees.  You have the option of earning points when you purchase online to redeem for free food items.

name: Sondra Hufhand
text: Amazing food fresh and hot. Love the new drive thru

name: Johnathon Lund
text: I am a truck driver, the guy who delivered my pizza and brought an extra box to have something to eat on, thank you so much that meant a lot. Very respectful, amazing pizza and quick. Thank you so much!

name: Jessica Salyer
text: We ordered taco pizza and we got plain tortillas on the taco? Whoâ€™s bright idea was it to change it from nacho to plan tortillas because supposedly plan tortilla sells better ur wrong! I wonâ€™t eat it with plan! A lot of people like it with nacho! Bring nacho back!!!

name: Kim Shockey
text: Good pizza like always just a long way in line to drive through

name: susan gerber
text: Service was good everytime we have been there, but don't order any sandwiches they never have the bread for it. This has happened 2 or 3 times now. Pretty sure they need to find someone else to do the ordering. Other than that everything was great.

name: David Dinius
text: Always fast, fresh, hot, and made right. Love the drive up window.

text: Donâ€™t think about picking something up here, theyâ€™ll sit and talk in the back for 20 mins until someone comes to the window. Theyâ€™ll even look at you and wonâ€™t even  bother coming to the window. Horrible service.

text: Ordered a pineapple & ham pizza and hardly had any pineapple on it and also the wrong sauce. Delivery was on point though!

text: Its It's a new 4 month old facility and is extremely nice. Always good pizza! Great for families,  groups, or Individual dining. Courteous staff makes it even more enjoyable!

text: Not a great experience. Beautiful new building but that's about it. The buffet was full of nothing but pizzas with meat on them. Had to wait for a good amount of time before they brought out meatless pizza. The service was not the best â€¦More

text: Food was great, service was terrible. We were ignored the entire time, had to ask a different server for refills (still didn't get them), had to go up to the register to get our check so we could leave.
